title: Zig + WASM WebGPU Particle Life
description: A recreation of Nikita Lisitsa's Particle Life 2D simulation (original demo: https://lisyarus.github.io/webgpu/particle-life.html, blog post: https://lisyarus.github.io/blog/posts/particle-life-simulation-in-browser-using-webgpu.html), rebuilt in Zig + WebAssembly for high-performance physics calculations and GPU-accelerated rendering. Demonstrates emergent behavior through simple attraction/repulsion rules between particle types.
